response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your company. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I am confident it will meet your specific needs and expectations.

Considering the immense benefits this product offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an exceptional price of $850,000. This is an extraordinary chance to secure a high-quality asset at a significant discount compared to the market value.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am here to answer any questions you might have and assist you through the purchasing process.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 850000}
